DOC.brief_summary: Anterior cruciate ligament reapair painful procedure . Single shot femoral sciatic nerve block last 12-16 hr . Since dexamethasone prolongs brachial plexus block , use low extremity block prolong analgesia provide good outpatient pain relief surgery home .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Dexamethasone Duration Lower Extremity Blocks With Bupivacaine Subjects Having ACL Repair
